mySolution

function solution(arr) {
  var answer = [];
  arr.forEach((item, index) => {
    if (arr[index + 1] !== item) {
      answer.push(item);
    }
  });
  return answer;
}

BestSolution

function solution(arr) {
  return arr.filter((val, index) => val != arr[index + 1]);
}

import Link from 'next/link';
const posts = [
  { id: 0, title: '1ë²ˆê¸€ ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤.' },
  { id: 1, title: '2ë²ˆê¸€ ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤.' },

];
export default function Blog() {
  return (
    <>
      <h2 className="text-slate-700 text-3xl font-semibold">Blog í˜ì´ì§€ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤.</h2>
      {posts &&

}

export default async function BlogDetail({ params }: { params: Promise<{ slug: string }> }) {

}

mySolution

function solution(participant, completion) {
  completion.forEach((item) => {
    if (participant.includes(item)) {
      const removeIndex = participant.indexOf(item);
      participant.splice(removeIndex, 1);
    }
  });
  return participant[0];
}
